articles.title: Alibaba unveils new AI chip as China races to replace Nvidia’s H20 amid U.S. ban
articles.summary: Alibaba is testing a new artificial intelligence chip that could play a big role in China’s push to cut reliance on U.S. technology. The Wall Street Journal reported Friday that the chip, developed in-house, is built to handle a wider range of AI inference tasks than its predecessors. articles.title: Autodesk Stock Drives Higher on Strong Demand for Firm's Design Software
articles.summary: Autodesk beat profit and sales estimates on artificial intelligence data center demand for its design software.

articles.title: Marvell stock slumps after data center revenue, forecast disappoint
articles.summary: Marvell stock sunk after the artificial intelligence chipmaker gave weak guidance for the fiscal third quarter.

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Boom Lures Kazakhstan’s Oil Wealth
articles.summary: Kazakhstan is preparing to channel some of its national wealth into artificial intelligence infrastructure, joining a global rush where venture capital firms and energy-rich states are betting billions on the sector despite volatility and surging valuations.
